name: Danger Express (AnyOne05)
description:
This game is an entry to the Trijam 207

The theme was "Run towards the danger".

You are on top of a discontrolled train and you have to jump from one carriage to another avoiding the obstacles so you can reach the locomotive and stop the train.

Note: This took more time than I antecipated, and as I wanted to submit something before the deadline I couldn't playtest as much as I wanted.

Controls

W, A, S, D to move

Shift to run

Ctrl to crouch

Space to jump

Resources used

Some Unity Store ones and:

  • Train Locomotive and Wagons
    • https://sketchfab.com/NIKCORE
  • Train tracks
    • https://quaternius.com/packs/modulartrain.html
